name: Guard-En
description:
Artists: Briana Vu, Kelly Goff

Music/Audio: Austin Slade

Game Director/Engineer: Andony Escudero

Grow the right food for the kingdom in your floating island garden! Make sure you pay attention to those prices, the kingdom's economy can fluctuate at a moments notice. Beware the dragons at nighttime, they are coming to eat away your profits.
